General.Name: Volatus Aerospace Corp
General.Description: Volatus Aerospace Corp. provides integrated drone solutions for commercial and defense markets in Canada, the United States, Latin America, and rest of Europe. The company offers drone services comprising of infrastructure inspection, mapping, survey, and imaging; public safety and defense equipment; and drone cargo and delivery solutions. It also provides pilot certification, flight skills, equipment training, beyond-visual-line-of-sight readiness services. In addition, the company offers client in-house program development, operational manuals, safety systems, waivers and SFOCs, OEM equipment testing, and certification consulting related services, as well as engaged in GIS related solutions. Further, it researches and develops, manufactures, tests, and commercializes various technologies. Additionally, the company offers public safety, aircraft management, charter, and cargo services. Volatus Aerospace Corp. is based in Oro-Medonte, Canada.
General.Address: 60 Airport Road, Oro-Medonte, ON, Canada, L0L 2E0
